about_the_game:
Humay is an exciting adventure set in a universe where humans are not the only intelligent beings. In this adventure, our hero is Villeg from the Zaber race. Villeg's father was a Zaber with the power of rain and seeds. In addition to inheriting these powers, Villeg also controls the plants that flourish through rain and seeds.

The most distinctive feature of the Zaber race is that their hair looks like soil and resembles tree branches from different angles. They can also bond with each other and grow to enormous sizes, making even the powers of the ancient gods pale in comparison. Additionally, Zaber can control the plants and animals in nature. The Zabers are divided into different tribes. In our story, we encounter the Desert Zabers, the Sea Zabers, and Villeg's tribe, the Seed and Rain Zabers.

At the start of our adventure, unwanted guests arrive on the lands nurtured by the Zabers. These guests include not only the Desert and Sea Zabers but also creatures that have evolved from Zabers into rats under the command of the Bat Queen. The Desert and Sea Zabers have been deceived, but the intentions of the Rats and the Bat Queen are malicious.

Our hero will fight to liberate the three regions from these invaders. He will receive significant assistance from the Cat Cult, who will eagerly stand against the rats, and from beings formerly known as gods, now called the elementals, who will help him in his quest.
detailed_description:
Humay is an exciting adventure set in a universe where humans are not the only intelligent beings. In this adventure, our hero is Villeg from the Zaber race. Villeg's father was a Zaber with the power of rain and seeds. In addition to inheriting these powers, Villeg also controls the plants that flourish through rain and seeds.

The most distinctive feature of the Zaber race is that their hair looks like soil and resembles tree branches from different angles. They can also bond with each other and grow to enormous sizes, making even the powers of the ancient gods pale in comparison. Additionally, Zaber can control the plants and animals in nature. The Zabers are divided into different tribes. In our story, we encounter the Desert Zabers, the Sea Zabers, and Villeg's tribe, the Seed and Rain Zabers.

At the start of our adventure, unwanted guests arrive on the lands nurtured by the Zabers. These guests include not only the Desert and Sea Zabers but also creatures that have evolved from Zabers into rats under the command of the Bat Queen. The Desert and Sea Zabers have been deceived, but the intentions of the Rats and the Bat Queen are malicious.

Our hero will fight to liberate the three regions from these invaders. He will receive significant assistance from the Cat Cult, who will eagerly stand against the rats, and from beings formerly known as gods, now called the elementals, who will help him in his quest.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS 64 bit or SteamOS (other distributions may work, but are not officially supported)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 support or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS 64 bit or SteamOS (other distributions may work, but are not officially supported)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL 3.3 support or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13.6 (High Sierra) or higher
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal Capable GPU supported by Apple (Apple Silicon, Intel – HD4000 and newer (ivy bridge and newer), AMD – HD7000 and newer)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13.6 (High Sierra) or higher
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal Capable GPU supported by Apple (Apple Silicon, Intel – HD4000 and newer (ivy bridge and newer), AMD – HD7000 and newer)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Humay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 destekli veya daha iyi bir ekran kartı
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 destekli veya daha iyi bir ekran kartı
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
